### End User Entity

### Contract Description 
The successful contractor will provide all necessary labour, materials, services, and equipment for HVAC upgrade work on a building at Victoria, BC, including demolition and construction work. The HVAC system must remain operational 24/7 throughout the project duration, including the construction phase. 

The solicitation will be competitively sourced in two phases on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) / Ariba Discovery Electronic Procurement System. An optional in-person site visit will be scheduled during phase 2.
